description: List the resources that are associated to a custom line item.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The ARN of the custom line item for which the resource associations will be listed.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: (Optional) A ListResourcesAssociatedToCustomLineItemFilter that can specify the types of resources that should be retrieved. Relationship (string) --- The type of relationship between the custom line item and the associated resource.

nested_params.name: Relationship
nested_params.description: The type of relationship between the custom line item and the associated resource.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The custom line item ARN for which the resource associations are listed.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResources
nested_items.description: A list of ListResourcesAssociatedToCustomLineItemResponseElement for each resource association retrieved.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the associated resource.

nested_items.name: Relationship
nested_items.description: The type of relationship between the custom line item and the associated resource.

nested_items.name: EndBillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The end billing period of the associated resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to be used in subsequent requests to retrieve additional results.
